name: AIRPORT SERVICES ASSOCIATION
goal:
Industry Organisation for airport ground service providers including a European Chapter representing the interests of handlers which are independent from airlines and airports.
Networking platform e.g. for relations/partnerships with IATA, ACI, ICAO,EASA and other relevant stakeholder associations.
At EU level, prime focus on ensuring a level playing field at airports for all types of handlers. Member of the EU Social Dialogue for Civil Aviation. Relations with EASA.
interests: Competition, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Single market, Transport
euInitiatives:
Proper Implementation of Directive 96/67/EC access to the ground handling market at EU airports.
EU Social Dialogue Working Group on Ground Handling
Revision EASA Basic Regulation
Revision Air Passenger Rights Regulation
Implementation Regulation 376/2014 on reporting, analysis and follow-up of occurrences
2019 review of Directive EC1996/67
